products.name: Swiss Gear 15.6" Laptop Backpack (SWA2102005) - Grey
products.shortDescription: Perfect for work, school, and leisure, this Swiss Gear 15.6" laptop backpack is both stylish and comfortable. It features specially contoured shoulder straps, a padded ergonomic design, and tons of compartments to help keep you organized.

products.name: IT Luggage Palermo Collection 3-Piece Hard Side 4-Wheeled Spinner Expandable Luggage Set - Black
products.shortDescription: This 3-piece luggage set from IT's Palermo collection is built to last. The hard side polycarbonate shell and corner protectors will help it survive the rigours of travel, the expanding structure lets you pack more of your stuff, while the extendable handle and easy glider spinner wheels make it easy to maneouver.

products.name: Garmin Forerunner 910XT GPS Watch - Black
products.shortDescription: Monitor your movements with the Garmin Forerunner 910XT. This GPS watch provides swim metrics tracking, as well as distance, pace, and elevation readouts for running and cycling. This water- and shock-resistant watch is designed for exercise in all types of environments.

products.name: Swiss Gear Matterhorn 3-Piece 4-Wheeled Expandable Luggage Set - Merlot
products.shortDescription: Arrive at your destination in style, toting this Swiss Gear Luggage Set. Besides its chic exterior, self-repairing zippers and water-resistant ABS please by keeping your goods intact during travel, and expansion features of the two larger pieces leave room for any last-minute items or souvenirs.

products.name: G Shock Solar Atomic Men's Digital Sport Watch (GW-6900-1CR) - Black
products.shortDescription: The solar-powered Casio G-Shock GW6900 men's digital watch builds on the functions of the DW6900 G-Shock model to deliver more power while retaining its utilitarian design. This Solar Atomic version offers Multi-Band Atomic Timekeeping, covering 31 time zones in 48 world cities. Shock and water resistant, it can take on whatever life throws at you.

products.name: Swiss Gear Matterhorn 3-Piece 4-Wheeled Expandable Luggage Set - Black
products.shortDescription: Arrive at your destination in style, toting this Swiss Gear Luggage Set. Besides its chic exterior, self-repairing zippers and water-resistant ABS please by keeping your goods intact during travel, and expansion features of the two larger pieces leave room for any last-minute items or souvenirs.

products.name: Samsonite 18" Travel Backpack (61809-2642) - Black/Blue
products.shortDescription: This Samsonite travel backpack is perfect for toting around your laptop when you're on the go. You'll find comfort and security in the padded straps and back panel, and convenience in the two mesh water bottle pockets. Rigorously tested to the highest of Samsonite's standards, you'll be carrying with confidence.

products.name: Swiss Gear 2-Piece Hard Side 4-Wheeled Expandable Luggage Set - Oxblood
products.shortDescription: Enjoy a hassle-free travel experience with this Swiss Gear 2-piece hard side 4-wheeled expandable luggage set. The spin 360 4-wheel system allows for easy manoeuverability around crowded airports and bus and train stations, and the expansion feature lets you take more of your stuff with you.

products.name: American Tourister 4-Piece 2-Wheeled Luggage Set - Black
products.shortDescription: The four-piece luggage set from American Tourister features strong and durable spinners for easy mobility in any direction. It has been constructed of lightweight and durable 600D polyester that will endure wear without weighing you down.

products.name: Safety 1st Advanced Solutions No-Touch Temporal Thermometer (TH059)
products.shortDescription: Now you can monitor your little one's temperature without disturbing them in their sleep with the Safety 1st No Touch Temporal thermometer. Just position the thermometer above their temple and you'll have an accurate reading in just one second.

products.name: Evenflo Big Kid DLX Jonah Booster Car Seat - Black/Grey
products.shortDescription: The Evenflo Big Kid DLX booster car seat offers a 2-in-1 design to smoothly transition from a high-back booster car seat to a no-back booster car seat. With dual-activity lights and built-in speakers, your child can read and colour during evening commutes. Side-impact testing ensures it meets safety standards in the event of a side collision.

products.name: Philips AquaTouch Plus Wet & Dry Electric Shaver (AT893) - Black
products.shortDescription: For a smooth, comfortable shave, the Philips AquaTouch Plus wet and dry electric shaver is a cut above. Equipped with a dual-blade system with DualPrecision shaving heads, this razor delivers an ultra-close shave of even the shortest stubble. The pop-up trimmer offers a great tool for grooming your prized moustache or sideburns.

products.name: EXERPEUTIC 100XL Magnetic Treadmill
products.shortDescription: Get your heart racing and stay in shape with the help of this Exerpeutic 100XL Magnetic Treadmill. This fitness machine helps you lose body fat, tone muscles and get in shape. Unlike most of other manual treadmills, the 100XL starts as low as an 8% incline which prevents strain on ankles and leg muscles.

products.name: Tucano Milano Italy Tech-Yo 15.6" Laptop Backpack (BKTY-B) - Blue
products.shortDescription: Work on the move comfortably with Tucano Milano Italy. This ergonomic backpack offers both dedicated laptop and tablet pockets for keeping your devices safe as you travel from office to meeting and back again.

products.name: Evenflo Portable BabySuite Play Yard - Grey / White / Blue
products.shortDescription: From playtime to naptime, the Evenflo Portable BabySuite Play Yard is your care companion.  The padded floor of this foldable and lightweight full-size bassinet converts to a playtime playmat with attachable toy bar. Its changer rotates out of the way and has a storage console to keep diaper-changing supplies and other essentials close.

products.name: Kenneth Cole Renegade II 3-Piece 8-Wheeled Spinner Expandable Luggage Set (KCR280501) - Red
products.shortDescription: Travel in style with this Kenneth Cole Renegade II 3-piece luggage set. Made from acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS) materials, they boast a durable but lightweight exterior that includes moulded corner reinforcements designed to withstand maximum impact, and various pockets and compartments for storing all your travel essentials.

products.name: Samsonite Perfect Fit 16" Polyester 2 Gusset Laptop Briefcase - Black
products.shortDescription: Tote around your laptop in this stylish and functional 16" laptop briefcase from Samsonite. This bag features a dedicated, padded laptop compartment, as well as front pocket organization. The padded handles and shoulder strap make it easy to take your laptop anywhere easily and comfortably.

products.name: IT Luggage Palermo Collection 3-Piece Hard Side 4-Wheeled Spinner Expandable Luggage Set - Silver
products.shortDescription: This 3-piece luggage set from IT's Palermo collection is built to last. The hard side polycarbonate shell and corner protectors will help it survive the rigours of travel, the expanding structure lets you pack more of your stuff, while the extendable handle and easy glider spinner wheels make it easy to maneouver.

products.name: Evenflo Symphony DLX Concord Convertible Car Seat - Grey/Black
products.shortDescription: Enjoy superior safety and convenience with the Evenflo Symphony DLX All-In-One Car Seat. This convertible carrier accommodates children from newborns to 48 months or older, providing protection with superior e3 side impact cushioning that absorbs energy to reduce forces in side impact crashes.

products.name: ObusForme Handheld Body Massager (TM-MGR-01) - Silver
products.shortDescription: Give your aching muscles some much-needed relief with the ObusForme Professional body massager. Equipped with dual pulsating heads, this hand-held device massages at up to 3,000 pulses per minute. Three massage head attachments and variable speed control let you customize your massage, and a neoprene-covered handle offers a comfortable grip.

products.name: Swiss Gear 15.6" Laptop Backpack (SWA1825009) - Black
products.shortDescription: Perfect for work, school, and leisure, this Swiss Gear 15.6" laptop backpack is both stylish and comfortable. It features specially contoured shoulder straps, a padded ergonomic design, and tons of compartments to help keep you organized.

products.name: Exerpeutic 4000 Magnetic Elliptical
products.shortDescription: Get a great cardio workout without the strain on your knees, shins and ankles with the EXERPEUTIC 4000 Magnetic Elliptical Trainer. It features a smooth, low-impact workout, dual-action handlebars for your upper body, and hand pulse sensors to monitor your heart rate.

products.name: Obusforme Kneading Shiatsu Cushion (SM-SMC-05)
products.shortDescription: Enjoy the benefits of Shiatsu massage every day with this Kneading Shiatsu Cushion from ObusForme. Easily strapped over most chairs, this cushion sends four massage nodes, with or without heat, traveling up and down your back to relax and rejuvenate your spine and body. Great for use at home or in the office.

products.name: Lorex 150m Range Video Baby Monitor (BB1811) - White
products.shortDescription: Feel like you're right next to your little one even when tapping away at the home office or puttering around the house completing chores. Watch baby's little movements or tune in to every baby breath anywhere you go with the Lorex BB1811 Sweet Peep compact baby monitor. It offers a 450-foot outdoor wireless range and clear night vision.

products.name: G Shock Men's Analog/Digital Sport Watch (AWG-M100-1ACR) - Black
products.shortDescription: The Casio G-Shock AWGM100 men's digital watch delivers non-stop performance, thanks to a tough solar-powered battery that keeps the watch going. Multi-Band Atomic Timekeeping receives signals from 31 time zones to keep displayed time accurate. A unique hand adjustment lets you shift the hands out of the way of the digital window for easier viewing.

products.name: Amour Freshwater Pearl Necklace & Earring Set
products.shortDescription: Add a touch of elegance to your ensemble with this two-piece classic pearl jewelry set from Amour. Crafted in gold tone, this gorgeous set comes with a necklace and stud earrings featuring enchanting 7-8mm freshwater pearls. The necklace is secured with a fisheye clasp, while the matching earrings are secured with butterfly backs.

products.name: Obusforme Shiatsu Neck Massager (SM-SNM-02)
products.shortDescription: Get a spa experience at home using the ObusForme shiatsu and vibration neck massager. With multiple movement modes, flex handles, and the option of adding heat to your treatment, this soothing relaxation tool is designed to help you enjoy customized, optimized muscle therapy.

products.name: Muse Brain-Sensing Headband (MU-01-BK-EN) - Black
products.shortDescription: Give your brain a workout with the Muse brain-sensing headband. It helps you to train your brain to improve your focus, composure, and response as in sessions, thanks to focused-attentions exercises that deliver real-time feedback.

products.name: Samsonite 2-Piece 4-Wheeled Spinner Suitcase (50634-1726) - Silver
products.shortDescription: Frequent travellers can count on Samsonite to last through every plane, train and automobile ride on their itinerary. Performance-tested at full capacity to ensure quality and strength, these spinners are also water resistant and expandable, ensuring all your goods, including those extra souvenirs, arrive at destination in one, dry piece.

products.name: Samsonite Poly Slim 16" Polyester Laptop Briefcase - Black
products.shortDescription: This 16" slim laptop briefcase from Samsonite is the perfect blend of style and function. This bag features a dedicated, padded laptop compartment, as well as front pocket organization. The padded handles and shoulder strap make it easy to take your laptop anywhere easily and comfortably.

products.name: Baby's First 4-Piece Infant Bedding Crib Set (31718-311-CRST-SAFA) - Safari
products.shortDescription: Your little one will be well prepared for sweet dreams with this four-piece crib set featuring a comforter, crib skirt, printed crib sheet, and wall decals. Made of 100 percent polyester microfibre, they sleep soundly and comfortably.

products.name: Casio Edifice Marine Men's Dress Analog Watch (EFM-100-1AVCF) - Black
products.shortDescription: Dive into great style with the Casio Edifice Marine line of watches. Stylish and waterproof to depths of 200m, this watch displays the time and date with brilliant luminescent paint for optimal visibility.
